alert.note: Alert for Eastern Albany; Eastern Rensselaer; Eastern Schenectady; Montgomery; Northern Washington; Schoharie; Southern Herkimer; Southern Saratoga; Southern Washington; Western Albany; Western Rensselaer; Western Schenectady (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 24 at 3:25PM EST until January 26 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM WEDNESDAY TO 1 AM EST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches and ice accumulations of a glaze to up to one tenth of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...The Mohawk and Schoharie Valleys, Greater Capital Region, The Helderbergs, Washington County and northern Taconics. * WHEN...From 10 AM Wednesday to 1 AM EST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact the afternoon and evening commute on Wednesday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates will be near one inch per hour on Wednesday afternoon and early evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
